title: Support for Windows XP and Vista Ending Soon

replies.body: awww shit when i tell grandma she can't play league anymore she is gonna flip out!
Logged in to upvote
tell her to buy the account transfer to windows 7
lmao
Damn no more support? gotta try a new lane i guess
this took me to long to get.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
underrated comment
What about Windows 98? Will I be okay?
I hope so cause I plan to up date my windows 3.1 to 98 for Christmas.

So now that resources will no longer be dedicated to making sure League can properly run on old operating systems, more resources will be dedicated towards making the buggy, slow, clunky client work properly on the newer operating systems...right?
dont count on it {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Probably another Jinx skin
Or an Ahri skin. I bet those engineers are not going to work on fixing the real issues here
You must be fun at parties Manate
Thats cool but when will it support Windows 10
Agreed. It blows my mind the CLIENT requires a better computer than the GAME. You're doing it wrong riot. It's backwards.
win 10 works perfect
As long as you don't consider the client. At this point for Windows 10 the client requires higher specs than the game itself.
The client requires higher specs than running full on HD skyrim decked out with hundreds of mods.
oof
How about League voice support for Mojave? :D
Why not just use Discord or something? It's far superior to the voice program in game.
What would you say is superior about it?

1. Works with more games than League
2. Works when someone isn't in the party yet
3. Works when someone has to restart their League client
agreed 100%
Discord has no privacy. The man is not going to tell me what I can and can not do on my VoIP service.
Are you gonna start supporting windows 10 now?
you guys so focused on this bs why not fix your champs n un ban account's instead of doing this dumb shit

these are completely different dev teams. The people who do that actual work on the game code dont do any balancing or banning, and the same goes for the other two teams{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

and the ones who do control the banning system are pumped up on drugs or something cause I got reported by two trolls for literally NO REASON. because they decided to take my camps in the jungle and troll me non stop for no reason. and threatens to report me (and actually does) because he's the one that's starting stuff. I reported them as well because they were the ones who were actually griefing  but I aint go no notifications that they've been banned. the banning and balancing devs at riot need to get their thumbs out of their bums and do the right thing instead of the wrong thing.
The system banned me when game crashed and I need to restart
you dont get banned for leaving a game. you get leaver buster. so either fix your pc to prevent continuous crashing or stop complaining
Guess I can't play on my toaster anymore, huh?
Actually, most toasters run Windows 8. You should be fine.
As long as you let me play on my ancient MacBook Pro 2011 with over 100 ping 90% of the time im okay {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

I was playing on my 2010 Mac until recently XD Those things go forever...unfortunately just got notified Steam is no longer gonna support Mac Yosemite, which is the newest OS I can use without significantly slowing performance :\
>Mac

But I’m all honesty, I run League on a Macmini and with everything in the lowest setting possible I only have 80-90 ping. Got that great average of 13 FPS though when not in combat and it takes a couple seconds to open the shop.
What about my commador 64? Will I still be able to play on that?
Sweet! Any information about linux? How about windows 10?
So window 7 still can play league of legends ?

Hopefully windows 10 will be fully supported one day. On some patches, the game will stall for 2 seconds every time it loads a new texture.

Baron will spawn and the moment you get vision of it the game freezes for a second.

I think that may have something to do with your Processing Speed or Graphics Card. Cause I've never had that problem or anything similar. And I used to run the game on an old 2010 Laptop using on board Graphics with an older Intel Processor.

That is what I would have thought too but it shouldn't be the case. I have:

1060 GTX 3GB VRAM
i7-8700k @ 3.70GHz
16 GB DD4 RAM

It did the same thing on my previous system that had an AMD chip and 16 GB DD3 RAM with the same GPU. I can run every modern game at max settings. Some League of Legends patches will run fine, then other patches will have the freezing issue every time it loads a new texture. Despite the fact that this current patch has a new baron skin and a snow map, this patch does NOT have the freeze issue for some reason. It is highly likely that it will be back in the next patch or two though :(

"How many players will be affected by this change?
Usage of Windows XP has been falling rapidly over the last few years. When we most recently pulled data, we found that under 1 percent of players globally are still using XP. Usage of Vista is even lower. And we think that by the time we end support for the operating systems next year, even fewer will be playing."

Can I have a number? Seeing as we don't have a good number to even use the percentages. Pfft
I have it on one of my comps. I use it for one game per day. Frame rate of five. No kappa
